text:
This is a residential building. However, it is being en-blocked as it has been around for 25 over years. The facilities are: Visitor parking lots
Shaded residents lots
Swimming pool with shallow and deep end
Playground
Gate to walk to Bus stop
5 minute walk to the bus stop
7 minute walk to the KAP MRT station
Near Methodist Girls School.

There is a wonderful view of areas such as The Sterling, Casa Esperenza, Cascadia, MGS and so on. This is very convienient
This bus stop design is bad. It was built reverse. Commuters can see buses coming very clearly. Need to rebuild.
